name: Joia Jitahidi
what_you_do: Joia Jitahidi is an inspirational and business savvy executive coach, international bestselling author and speaker who supports leaders in the workplace.
who_you_serve: Joia works with executives and managers from private, public, not-for-profit, and multi-billion dollar companies.
social_proof: Joia has worked with Fortune 500 companies such as IBM, AMD, AT&T and Lockheed and with over 50 state agencies including The Texas Department of Human Resources, The Environmental and Conservation State Department and the General Land Office. Joia is the author of Making Austin Work: A Book of INSIDE Information about the world of work in Austin, Texas and Intuitive Management: Creating an Inspired Workforce.
signature_programs: Divine Purpose Path (6 Week Online Course), Divine Purpose Journey (12 Month Program)
business_focus: Joia supports leaders in the workplace to know their 'why' and accomplish their goals.
